statements: DELETE FROM NutrientCyclingData WHERE EcosystemID = 1 AND NutrientName = 'Nitrogen';
DELETE FROM NutrientCyclingData WHERE SourceOrganism = 'Plant' AND NutrientCycleStage = 'Decomposition';
DELETE FROM EcosystemModel WHERE EcosystemName = 'Forest' AND EcosystemType = 'Tropical'
DELETE FROM Nutrient_Exchange_Log WHERE Sender_Location = 'Location_A' AND Nutrient_Type = 'Nitrogen';
DELETE FROM Nutrient_Exchange_Log WHERE Sender_Location = 'Farm' AND Nutrient_Type = 'Nitrogen';
DELETE FROM NutrientCyclingData WHERE id = 1 AND nutrient_level > 5.0;
